price: (Bene Isiraheli) twabatoranyije tubizi tubarutisha ibiremwa (byo ku gihe cyabo),
arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqadi ikh'tarnāhum ʿalā ʿil'min ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
